RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 6 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PERFECTINGTHEVIEW pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, dug in gamely through the final stages and proved best under strong handling. POLISHED GEM away alertly, set the pace until deep stretch and finished second best while three wide. SOMUCHSUGAR swung five wide leaving the clubhouse turn, dropped inside entering the second turn, loomed boldly along the rail in upper stretch then was outfinished. LIBERTY BELLE hopped at the start, offered a mild bid four wide on the far turn then leveled off. STARSHIP MACYS stalked the pace three wide, inched closer midway on the far turn then failed to sustain that bid. FLAXEN trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Polished Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace late stretch, second best, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Perfectingtheview
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, long drive, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Liberty Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, middle move, 4 wide, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Somuchsugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide backstretch, dropped inside 2nd turn, loomed boldly rail

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Macys
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, middle move, 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 6 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Multiple Winners For A Claiming Price Of $5,000 Or More In 2022 - 2023 Preferred)(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRINCESS HALIME stalked the pace along the inside into the turn, shifted out, rallied determinedly in the seven path under right handed urging and got up in time. ORBIT MARS broke in front, gave up the lead soon thereafter, chased the leader into the stretch, rallied to make the lead in the six path nearing the furlong marker and just missed hanging on. COWGIRL KIMMIE sped to the lead two wide soon after the start, set the pace until mid stretch then weakened and drifted out nearing the wire. LUCKY TO HAVE ME saved ground to no avail. JOLIE RULER failed to menace. LIVE IT UP was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Halime
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, shifted out turn, rallied 7path, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Cowgirl Kimmie
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace mid stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Orbit Mars
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, chased, led late 6path, caught

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 38. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CREME DE MAIS dropped inside shortly after the start, rallied through the turn making the lead near the quarter pole then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best while being kept to task. ROARING GINGER stalked the pace into the stretch, surged late two wide and finished clear for second. BROKEN JEWEL away alertly, set the pace in the four then five paths for a half then weakened late. WEEKENDING close up along the inside, failed to respond. UNEXPECTEDVALENTYN failed to menace. CANELA FINA was no threat. PUNCHCORN was outrun. DOZZA was no threat, stopped in the stretch, was eased to the wire and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Roaring Ginger
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, surged 2 wide, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Broken Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, 4-5paths, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Dozza
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat, stopped, eased to wire, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Creme de Mais
ENTRY.OWNER: Carvalho Diocilio and Authentic Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped inside early, rallied turn, widened, much the best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 6 Allow ed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAPPY BEE broke in front, prompted the pace two wide into the stretch, dug in determinedly under right handed urging through the final sixteenth of a mile and was along in time. WINDY LU WHO away alertly, set the pace along the inside until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. BLAZING ZENNA stalked the top pair into the stretch then faded. SHE'S CRAFTY trailed into the stretch and found her best stride late outside. ON A TOUR failed to menace. INCESSANT well placed, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Windy Lu Who
ENTRY.OWNER: Pocket Aces Racing LLC and Susan Anderson Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace late stretch, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, pressed pace, 2 wide, dug in right urging, in time

ENTRY.NAME: She's Crafty
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 6. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less No t Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS OVER THERE with the second flight between horses, improved near the inside through the turn, shifted out to the seven path entering the stretch, rallied under left handed urging and was along in time. LA MUNECA away alertly, set the pace with a clear lead until deep stretch while in the five path the couldn't handle the winner. CHARGAREE never far back, saved ground and finished determinedly. OUT ATTHE SPEEDWAY stalked the pace from the five path and went evenly. PRINCESS CONSUELA failed to menace. FANCY EMPRESS trailed into the stretch then passed tiring rivals outside. FLOWZANO had speed for three furlong then faded. ESPECIALLY YOU chased the leader through the turn then flattened out. ORBETTE settled mid pack and gave way in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Chargaree
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, saved ground, finished determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: La Muneca
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, shook clear 5path, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Over There
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, improved inside turn, angled 7path, in time

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 13800. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPECIAL ASSISTANT chased the pace from the inside into the stretch, shifted out to the four path, rallied under right handed urging to make the lead late and drew clear under a strong hand ride. SOULSTONE was hustled to the lead along the inside soon after the start, set the pace until deep stretch then was no match for the winner and held on for second. I MATTER trailed through the turn then, closed willingly in the two then four paths through the stretch and just missed getting up for second. IRON WILMA moved up three wide on the turn then leveled off. TIME FOR CUPID failed to menace. LEMONSANDDIAMONDS chased the pace into the stretch then faded. DANCING FOR MONEY was no threat. LUNA MIA had speed into the turn, stopped and returned bleeding from the nostrils.

ENTRY.NAME: Special Assistant
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inside, angled out 4path, late burst, drew clear,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fred Seitz, Wild Currant Farm LLC & Double K LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Soulstone
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, set pace late stretch, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Mia
ENTRY.OWNER: Ruiz Lilliam and MM Racing LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing for Money
ENTRY.OWNER: Velez Jose Luis and Szczepanski Emily

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Wilma
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 14100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EL SICARIO broke in front, set all the pace and finished full of run under right handed urging to win going away. PASION AZTECA saved ground through the far turn, shifted to the four path at the top of the stretch and finished second best. JOE BRRRR chased the winner into the stretch, drifted out a bit when put to a left handed stick near the three sixteenths pole then was outfinished. OLD FORTY FIVE went evenly. PRETTY LOUD failed to menace. AUTOPOLIS had speed for a half then weakened. BAHAMIAN BEAT chased the winner early and was through after a half. THE RIDER OF OLD FORTY FIVE LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF JOE BRRRR FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE AT THE TOP OF THE STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Pasion Azteca
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, shifted 4path top lane, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: El Sicario
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, full of run, going away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 67. Allowance Purse 36200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 6 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUSHI Q away alertly, set all the pace under pressure and wore down rivals in a game effort. NICEASAKITTENSEYES never far back, closed willingly four then three wide and finished second best. LUCKY PENNY ROSE trailed through the far turn then found her best stride late four wide. CAUSE OF LOVE stalked the early pace, moved up four then three wide after a half, pressured the winner until deep stretch then was outfinished. QUEEN HIGH stalked the pace three wide, dropped inside on the far turn, loomed boldly at the top of the stretch then came up empty. I GOT HOPE pressed the pace two wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Sushi Q
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, wore down rivals, gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: I Got Hope
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Niceasakittenseyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 4 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Queen High
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, dropped inside, loomed boldly, weakened
